name: J.I.M
description: Fitness-Oriented Chatbot designed to assist users in selecting appropriate exercises, warm-ups, and providing health-related information.
achievements: Contributed in achieving GPA of 4.0 in Introduction to Artificial Intelligence module.
Achieved a 94.4% success rate in providing users with helpful and relevant information.
Assisted users in selecting exercises and warm-ups to target specific muscle groups.
Responded to health-related inquiries with accurate and reliable information.

name: APU Programming Cafe
description: Coaching Class Application for Programming that includes user registration, deletion, and SQL database management.

Designed and implemented the Administrator role within the application.
Enabled user registration and deletion for efficient management.
Designed and optimized SQL database schemas.
Implemented queries for data retrieval and manipulation.

name: Food Ordering System
description: An online food ordering system that allows customers to browse and place orders for various food types through multiple vendors.
achievements: Contributed in achieving GPA of 3.7 in Object Oriented Development with Java module.
Developed an efficient online food ordering system.
Integrated notifications using text files to keep users informed about their order status.
Created a user registration process for new users.
Utilized text files for efficient data storage and management.
Collaborated effectively with team members using GitHub and Git for version control.
